page.title: 16My House (4)
page.content: I live in a detached bungalow which is owner occupied. It is made of brick. We have 3 bedrooms, 1 sitting room, 1 dining room ,1 bath room and 1 kitchen. We have 1 garage. We have a big garden . In the back of our garden we used to have a vegetable garden but then we planted grass to make a lawn. In our garden we have a patio. On the patio we have got a brick barbecue which my daddy made. Behind our garden there is a field but it does not belong to us. It belongs to the farmer. Our garage has got a flat roof. In our garden we have a big willow tree.
